text: Faith Evans (born June 10, 1973 in Lakeland, Florida) is an American R&B; singer. She grew up in Newark, New Jersey. Her first husband, The Notorious B.I.G., died in a drive-by shooting in 1997 . She has been arrested for cocaine and marijuana. Evans' album R&B; Divas was nominated for Best R&B; Album at the 2014 Grammy Awards. ==Discography== ===Studio albums=== * Faith (1995) * Keep the Faith (1998) * Faithfully (2001) * The First Lady (2005)'' * A Faithful Christmas (2005) * Something About Faith (2010) * Incomparable (2014) ===Collaboration albums=== * The King & I (with The Notorious B.I.G.) (2017) == Related pages == * I'll Be Missing You == References == Category:1973 births Category:Living people Category:Singers from Florida Category:Singers from Newark, New Jersey
title: Faith Evans
